alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 5:20PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Alamosa, southeastern Rio Grande and north central Conejos Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 520 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Capulin, or 11 miles southwest of Alamosa, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Capulin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft
